casebody.data:
In the Matter of IBM Credit Corp. No. 520A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 20, 2007. S.C. Kitchen, Durham, for Durham County. Michael T. Medford, Judson A. Welborn, Raleigh, for IBM Credit Corp. James B. Blackburn, III, Lucy Chavis, Assistant County Attorney, for NC Asso. of County Comm.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of December 2007 by Appellee for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Appellee shall have up to and including the 4th day of January 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of December 2007."
